name: Todo List Manager
description: A full-featured task management application with user-specific todos, priority levels, due dates, categories, and comprehensive admin controls. Users can organize their tasks with tags, set priorities, and track completion progress.
backend_requirements: 1. Todo model with SQLAlchemy: id, title (string, required, max 255), description (text, optional), completed (boolean, default False), priority (string: low/medium/high, default medium), due_date (datetime, optional), category (string, optional), user_id (foreign key to User), created_at, updated_at, is_active (boolean, default True)
2. Each todo belongs to a user (user_id foreign key) - users can only see/edit their own todos
3. REST API endpoints: GET /api/todos (list user's active todos with pagination), POST /api/todos (create), PUT /api/todos/:id (update), DELETE /api/todos/:id (soft delete)
6. Pagination: ?page=1&per_page=10 with total count in response
7. Input validation: title required (1-255 chars), priority must be low/medium/high, due_date must be valid ISO date
8. GET /api/todos/stats - return user's todo statistics (total, completed, pending, overdue count)
10. GET /api/todos/categories - return list of user's unique categories
frontend_requirements: 1. Main todo list view with cards showing: title, description preview, priority badge (color-coded), due date (highlight if overdue), completion checkbox, edit/delete buttons
2. Add todo form with fields: title (required), description (textarea), priority (dropdown), due date (date picker), category (input with autocomplete from existing categories)
3. Inline editing: click title to edit, click outside or press Enter to save
4. Filter bar with: search input, priority filter dropdown, category filter dropdown, show completed toggle
5. Sort dropdown: newest first, oldest first, due date, priority
6. Stats panel at top showing: total todos, completed count, pending count, overdue count (if any)
7. Empty state with illustration/icon and 'Create your first todo' call-to-action
9. Optimistic updates: checkbox toggles immediately, reverts on error
10. Bulk actions: select multiple todos, mark all complete, delete selected
12. Due date display: 'Today', 'Tomorrow', 'Overdue', or formatted date
admin_requirements: 1. Admin dashboard with stats cards: total todos (all users), total users, todos created today, completion rate percentage
2. User activity chart placeholder (show last 7 days todo creation counts)
3. Table listing ALL todos from ALL users with columns: ID, User, Title, Priority, Status, Created, Actions
5. Search across all todos by title or username
6. Filter by: user, priority, completion status, active/inactive
8. Bulk selection with checkboxes for mass operations
9. Bulk actions: delete selected, restore selected, export selected (as JSON)
10. User management section: list users with their todo counts, toggle user active status

api_endpoints.description: List user's active todos with filtering, sorting, pagination
Create new todo for current user
Get single todo by ID (must belong to user)
Get list of user's unique categories

admin_api_endpoints.description: List ALL todos from all users with pagination
List all users with their todo counts
